title: Why Carlos Santana's divisive, spiritual 'Caravanserai' wasn't 'career suicide'
description: Felix Contreras and Anamaria Sayre from NPR's Alt.Latino sit down with Carlos Santana to talk about nurturing his spirit, growing as an artist and 50 years of Caravanserai.
